com.itko.lisaint.java

Class JavaIntegrator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itko.lisaint.Integrator
      • com.itko.lisaint.java.JavaIntegrator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EJBIntegrator, WebserviceIntegrator

    public class JavaIntegrator
extends Integrator
implements java.io.Serializable
    This JavaIntegrator is a subclass of the Integrator that will Lisa Integrator supporting servers must derive from. The only specific methods to this class are in figuring out if Lisa Integration support is requested. Integration is enabled by default. If you want to disable it, you need to set the 'com.itko.lisaint.off' system property to 'true'. Remember, LISA will only actually record things if the incoming http request is coming from LISA, or there are LISA integration SOAP headers. In other words, systems configured with LISA integration will only report integration to LISA test cases, not other service consumers. If you prefer, you can determine wether Lisa support should be on or not in some application specific way, and call the setLisaOn() method explicitly.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
